GDPR.description: Primary EU law on data protection and privacy.

EU AI Act.description: Risk-based framework regulating AI development and deployment.

DGA.description: Framework to facilitate cross-border data sharing.

Data Act.description: Rules on fair access to and use of IoT generated data.

MiFID II.description: Regulates financial markets and mandates transparency.

PSD2 / PSD3.description: Regulates electronic payments and Open Banking data access.

DORA.description: IT risk management for financial entities.

SEPBLAC.description: Spanish AML/CTF law requiring strict KYC data collection.

PCI-DSS.full_name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
PCI-DSS.description: Technical standard for securing cardholder data.

GLBA.description: US law requiring financial institutions to protect consumer info.

SOX.description: Financial record-keeping and internal data controls.

HIPAA.full_name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
HIPAA.description: US standard protecting sensitive health information.

Ley 41/2002.description: Spanish law governing the privacy of clinical medical records.

EHDS.description: Framework for cross-border exchange of health data.

LSSI-CE.full_name: Ley de Servicios de la Sociedad de la Información
LSSI-CE.description: Spanish law regulating e-commerce and cookie data.

DSA.description: Regulation for platform accountability and transparency.

DMA.description: EU law preventing gatekeepers from unfair data use.

Law 5/2019.description: Spanish mortgage law requiring data transparency.

Solvency II.description: EU directive mandating Data Quality for insurance modeling.

LOSSEAR.full_name: Ley de Ordenación de Entidades Aseguradoras
LOSSEAR.description: Spanish transposition of Solvency II for insurance data.

IDD.description: EU rules on data transparency when selling insurance.
